eventDecorators.name: Created
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

parameterDecorators.name: owners_
parameterDecorators.description: Array of intial owners. If the list is empty, sending adress will be assigned as owner.

parameterDecorators.name: vPowers_
parameterDecorators.description: Array of voting weight of the owners, owner with vPower == 0 will be ignored.

parameterDecorators.name: requiredVote_
parameterDecorators.description: Number of votes needed to perform the request.
